subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=85|rad=水|as=10|sn=13|canj=EVFF|four=|ids=⿰氵⿱⿺𠃊火⿺𠃊火}}

# (ancient form of [[湛]]) (interchangeable [[沈]] [[沉]]) sink
# deep, profound
# joy, delight
# happy, peaceful (interchangeable [[潭]]) deep water, deep pool
# leisurely, relaxed
# dewy
# full, filled
# wet, damp, moist
# clear (interchangeable [[浸]]) to dip, to immerse, to soak
# swellings, roaring waves and billows
# flowing water
# (same as [[霪]] [[淫]]) to rain cats and dogs for a long time
# a river in ancient times in Henan province Jiyuanxian (blocked)
